summary.narrative: Novati Constructions, a Sydney-based builder operating since 1971, entered voluntary administration on 13 February 2026. Worrells have been appointed as administrators. Research is underway to identify the insolvent trading period and projects won during that time.

research.gaps: Administrator report not yet available. Insolvent trading period unknown. Projects not yet researched. No developer or lender contacts.

summary.narrative: Lanskey Constructions traded insolvent for over 12 months — the second-longest period in our study. During this time, they won 7 projects worth $87M across 4 states, including government schools and major retail developments. 19 projects totalling $141.5M were won within 6 months of the insolvent trading date.
